section.para:
Crank System defines various data structures, which are useful for game.
Vectorized types Matrix types Graph types

Crank System provides vector types. Each vector types are matched into following types.
CrankVecBool: gboolean
CrankVecInt: gint
CrankVecFloat: gfloat
Every vector types defined here can be categorized by 4 groups.
Fixed 2 sized vector Fixed 3 sized vector Fixed 4 sized vector Variable sized vector

Crank System also provides graph data structure.
Crank System currently provides only Digraph for now.
Also, Crank System also provides advanced operations on graphs, not only data structures.
Currently Crank System provides dijkstra, a* with customizable cost functions on graphs.
